targets.query: SELECT max("uptime") / 100 FROM "snmp" WHERE ("agent_host" = '172.16.100.3') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("ifHCInOctets"), 1s) *8 AS "in", non_negative_derivative(mean("ifHCOutOctets"), 1s) *8 AS "out" FROM "interface" WHERE ("agent_host" = '172.16.100.1' AND "ifDescr" =~ /eth2\.\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "ifDescr" fill(null)
